parameters.description: x location of the detail circle

parameters.name: YPosition
parameters.description: y location of the detail circle

parameters.name: Radius
parameters.description: Size of the radius of the detail circle

title: IDetailCircle.SetParameters
description: Sets the location and size of this detail circle.
signature:
System.Boolean SetParameters( 
   System.Double
XPosition
,
   System.Double
YPosition
,
   System.Double
Radius
)

parameters.name: XPosition
parameters.description: x location of the detail circle

parameters.name: YPosition
parameters.description: y location of the detail circle

parameters.name: Radius
parameters.description: Size of the radius of the detail circle

returns: True if the detail circle is created at the specified location and at the specified size, false if not
remarks:
Use
IModelDoc2::EditRebuild3
to update the drawing, including the detail circle.
